title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Mobile Technology-Based Adult Numeracy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Enhances the ability to solve mathematical problems by utilizing mobile applications (e.g., graphing calculators, statistical tools)
Shares mathematical problem-solving processes with peer learners and exchanges feedback using smartphone-based collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)
Completes projects applying mathematical approaches by connecting real-world problems (e.g., budget management, data analysis) with mobile technology
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
